Title: DSM - multiplayer shooter game in XNA 4.0
Description: DSM - starship simulator is a three-dimensional multiplayer network "shooter" made with XNA 4.0 Framework.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
DSM - starship simulator is a three-dimensional multiplayer network "shooter" made with XNA 4.0 Framework.
  • XNA 4.0 engine (DirectX 9) Windows XNA Game.
  • HLSL effects.
  • Particles effects (smoke, explosions), moving skybox and water.
  • Sound effects.
  • Starship models stored in .X files.
  • Map of terrain loaded from .bmp file.
  • Windows Forms starting interface and server application.
  • TCP-IP network multi-thread server with network-ordered bytes in packages.
  • Tested in 7 players game on local network.
